front.title: Multi-homing in EVPN with Inter-AS Option B

abstract.t: The BGP speaker that originates an EVPN Ethernet A-D per ES route is identified by the next-hop of the route. When the route is propagated by an ASBR as an Inter-AS Option B route, the ASBR overwrites the next-hop. This document describes a method to identify the originator of the route.
